meanings.definition: A person who manages or controls every part of a project or task in a detailed and excessive way.
meanings.sent1: The micromanagers in the office always want to know every little detail.
meanings.sent2: The team found it challenging to work under the micromanagers' constant supervision.
meanings.sent3: The micromanagers insisted on approving every pencil purchase, making the office supply closet a place of great debate.
meanings.sent4: The garden gnome, acting like a group of micromanagers, rearranged the flowers daily to their liking.
meanings.sent5: The image of the micromanagers with magnifying glasses, inspecting each paperclip, stuck in the team's minds.
